data.comment: The match has started.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 3, Monaco's Gelson Martins breaks free at Stade Louis II. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
In the minute 3, Monaco have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Monaco.
Montpellier have a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Montpellier a goal kick.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monaco are whistled for offside.
In the minute 8, At Stade Louis II, Montpellier are penalized for being offside.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Montpellier.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade Louis II.
Gaetan Laborde for Montpellier drives towards goal at Stade Louis II. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 14, Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the home team a throw-in.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Monaco.
In Fontvieille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
Monaco push forward at Stade Louis II and Aurelien Tchouameni gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Montpellier defence.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Monaco.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Monaco throw-in in Montpellier's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Monaco in the half of Montpellier.
Teji Savanier (Montpellier) has been shown a straight red card by referee Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Throw-in Montpellier.
In the minute 23, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, Monaco to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Monaco throw-in in Montpellier's half.
In Fontvieille Monaco's Wissam Ben Yedder is caught offside.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Montpellier in the half of Monaco.
In Fontvieille, Aurelien Tchouameni of Monaco is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
In the minute 28, Montpellier have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade Louis II.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a throw-in for Monaco, close to Montpellier's area.
In the minute 32, Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Fontvieille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 34, It's a goal kick for the home team in Fontvieille.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
Throw-in for Monaco close to the penalty box.
Monaco drives forward and Gelson Martins gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 37, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Montpellier.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 39, Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Montpellier a goal kick.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
In the minute 41, Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade Louis II.
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Montpellier throw-in in Monaco's half.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Monaco just outside Montpellier's area.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Fontvieille.
Wissam Ben Yedder (Monaco) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sofiane Diop of Monaco gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Montpellier a goal kick.
Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Montpellier.
The first-half is over at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 46, Monaco's Sofiane Diop is on target but unsuccessful.
Michel Der Zakarian (Montpellier) is making a first substitution, with Stephy Mavididi replacing Andy Delort.
Niko Kovac is making the team's first substitution at Stade Louis II with Stevan Jovetic replacing Kevin Volland.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
Throw-in for Montpellier at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
In the minute 50, It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
Goal! Montpellier have got their heads in front thanks to a Stephy Mavididi strike.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Montpellier drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Montpellier throw-in in Monaco's half.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Montpellier.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Montpellier have a goal kick.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
Cesc Fabregas is replacing Djibril Sidibe for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 59, The home team have replaced Aurelien Tchouameni with Willem Geubbels. This is the third substitution made today by Niko Kovac.
The home team have replaced Florentino Luis with Caio Henrique. This is the fourth substitution made today by Niko Kovac.
Throw-in for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 60, Throw-in Montpellier.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 61, Damien Le Tallec is replacing Florent Mollet for Montpellier at Stade Louis II.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
Montpellier have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Monaco have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Monaco's Cesc Fabregas misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
In the minute 66, Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Montpellier.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 69, Penalty! Hakim Ben el Hadj points to the spot, great chance for Monaco...
Wissam Ben Yedder scores from the spot and Monaco draw level at Stade Louis II.
Monaco make their fifth substitution with Pietro Pellegri replacing Sofiane Diop.
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 73, Pietro Pellegri for Monaco has been booked by Hakim Ben el Hadj and receives a first yellow card.
The away team replace Joris Chotard with Keagan Dolly.
Montpellier are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 74, Jordan Ferri is on a sub for Gaetan Laborde for Montpellier.
Montpellier's Arnaud Souquet attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 75, Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Monaco a goal kick.
Wissam Ben Yedder of Monaco smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fontvieille.
In the minute 76, Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Monaco in Fontvieille.
Montpellier needs to be cautious. Monaco have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 78, Monaco have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Monaco push upfield and Pietro Pellegri gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Montpellier defence.
In the minute 79, Monaco to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Monaco at Stade Louis II.
In the minute 80, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a Montpellier throw-in in Monaco's half.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Can Montpellier get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
In the minute 83, Monaco to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade Louis II.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, Monaco pushes forward through Stevan Jovetic, whose finish on goal is saved.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Montpellier a goal kick.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
Free kick Montpellier.
Montpellier are caught offside.
Free kick for Monaco in the half of Montpellier.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Junior Sambia is replacing Ambroise Oyongo for the away team.
Willem Geubbels (Monaco) has received a yellow card from Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Montpellier's Arnaud Souquet has been booked in Fontvieille.
